page_subtitle: Understanding how advanced analytics and machine learning transform baseball predictions

sections.title: Where Statistics Meet Strategy
sections.content: Baseball generates more measurable data per game than any other sport. Every pitch, swing, and defensive play creates events we can analyze and predict. Learn how we turn millions of data points into winning predictions.

sections.title: The Analytics Revolution
sections.subtitle: From gut feelings to data-driven decisions

events.title: Birth of Sabermetrics
events.description: Bill James pioneers statistical analysis, challenging traditional baseball wisdom with data.

events.title: Moneyball Era
events.description: Oakland A's prove small-market teams can compete using analytics. On-base percentage becomes king.

events.title: StatCast Revolution
events.description: MLB introduces tracking technology measuring exit velocity, launch angle, and sprint speed in real-time.

events.title: AI & Machine Learning
events.description: Neural networks process millions of data points, predicting outcomes with unprecedented accuracy.

sections.title: What Our Models CAN'T Predict
sections.subtitle: Honesty builds trust - here's what we admit we don't know
sections.intro: We don't predict magic. We find mathematical edges that work over thousands of bets. Here's what remains unpredictable:

limitations.description: A pitcher tears his hamstring in the 3rd inning
limitations.our_approach: Live betting models adjust, but can't predict freak injuries

limitations.description: Surprise lineup changes, early hooks, bullpen management
limitations.impact: Analytics say leave pitcher in, manager panics and pulls him
limitations.our_approach: Track tendencies, but humans are unpredictable

limitations.description: Family emergencies, off-field distractions, contract disputes
limitations.impact: Mental state affects performance in unmeasurable ways
limitations.our_approach: Can't quantify head not in the game

limitations.description: Some umps have bad days, miss obvious calls
limitations.impact: Strikeout becomes a walk, changes entire inning
limitations.our_approach: Track tendencies, but can't predict blown calls

limitations.description: Some believe certain players perform better in big moments
limitations.impact: Data shows clutch is mostly luck plus small sample noise
limitations.our_approach: Doesn't exist statistically - we ignore it

limitations.description: Team has momentum or clubhouse chemistry
limitations.impact: Narratives humans love, but data doesn't support
limitations.our_approach: Winning streaks don't predict future performance better than talent

sections.philosophy: We embrace uncertainty. Our edge comes from being right 55-60% of the time, not 100%. Bet value, not outcomes.
